thread.title: Punjab official arrested for spurious pesticide purchase
thread.title_full: Punjab official arrested for spurious pesticide purchase - Moneylife

author: IANS
title: Punjab official arrested for spurious pesticide purchase
text: Punjab agriculture director Mangal Singh has been arrested for his alleged role in the purchase of spurious pesticide that were sold to cotton farmers, police sources said on Monday.   A team of Punjab Police from Bathinda raided Mangal Singh's house in Sector 42 here late Sunday night and later arrested him.   The raid is still under way.
